script.name: H2
script.tableCreationScript: SELECT TABLE_CATALOG AS CATALOG, TABLE_SCHEMA AS SCHEMA, TABLE_NAME AS NAME, SQL, REMARKS FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_TYPE='TABLE'
script.indexCreationScript: SELECT TABLE_CATALOG AS CATALOG, TABLE_SCHEMA AS SCHEMA, TABLE_NAME AS NAME, SQL, REMARKS FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.INDEXES
script.triggerCreationScript: SELECT TRIGGER_CATALOG AS CATALOG, TRIGGER_SCHEMA AS SCHEMA, TRIGGER_NAME AS NAME, SQL AS SQL, REMARKS AS REMARKS FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TRIGGERS
script.procedureCreationScript: select ALIAS_CATALOG as CATALOG, ALIAS_SCHEMA as SCHEMA, ALIAS_NAME as NAME, JAVA_CLASS || '.' || JAVA_METHOD as SQL, REMARKS from INFORMATION_SCHEMA.FUNCTION_ALIASES where RETURNS_RESULT=1
script.functionCreationScript: select ALIAS_CATALOG as CATALOG, ALIAS_SCHEMA as SCHEMA, ALIAS_NAME as NAME, JAVA_CLASS || '.' || JAVA_METHOD as SQL, REMARKS from INFORMATION_SCHEMA.FUNCTION_ALIASES where RETURNS_RESULT=1
script.viewCreationScript: SELECT TABLE_CATALOG AS CATALOG, TABLE_SCHEMA AS SCHEMA, TABLE_NAME AS NAME, VIEW_DEFINITION AS SQL, REMARKS FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.VIEWS
